Texts.Eng:
Florans are known throughout the universe to be aggressive, carnivorous hunters. They still partially sustain themselves on sunlight, but every blow they strike only adds to their hunger.
 
  Diet: Carnivorous 

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, Health, Energy x^green;1.2^reset;
  Resist: +^green;25^reset;% Electric, Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Radiation
  ^green;Regenerate^reset; during daylight. If Health+Food are full, +^green;energy regen^reset;
  Immune: ^green;Electrified^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  In ^green;forest-like^reset; biomes:
    Health x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Bow:
    +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage, Damage x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Speed, -^green;0.1^reset;s Draw Time
  Spear / Dagger:
    Damage x^green;1.08^reset;, +^green;3^reset;% Crit, ^green;3^reset;% Poison Strike chance. If well fed, strike faster.
  Needler/Floran Weapons/Thrown:
    +^green;2^reset;% Crit
  Dual Needler or Dual Floran Weapons:
    ^green;8^reset;% Speed

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  All basic attacks ^red;consume food^reset; 
  Health x^red;0.9^reset; and Energy x^red;0.7^reset; at night
  Resist: -^red;50^reset;% Fire, -^red;25^reset;% Poison
